content: see picture very deep double_crochet next st see picture semi deep double_crochet next 2 sts double_crochet rest of the way around 60 double_crochet semi deep very deep rounds 19 27 double_crochet in each st around 60 double_crochet round 28 pouch round double_crochet in each of the next 35 sts chain 10 skip next 10 sts double_crochet in each of the 15 remaining sts of the round 50 double_crochet 10 chain round 29 double_crochet in each of the next 35 sts 10 double_crochet over chain from previous round double_crochet in 15 remaining sts 60 double_crochet round 30 *1 double_crochet in first st decrease over next two sts * repeat from * to * around 40 double_crochet round 31 double_crochet in each st around 40 double_crochet round 32 *decrease over next two sts * repeat from * to * around 20 double_crochet round 33 repeat round 32 10 double_crochet cut yarn leaving long tail with the yarn needle weave the yarn tail in and out of the last round of sts then pull to close the hole weave in ends legs ©2021 andrea lea/southern hooked stitches make 4 starting with the dusty grey yarn and g hook chain 6 row 1 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each across chain 1 turn 5 half_double_crochet row 2 5 half_double_crochet in each st across change to baby pink yarn at the end of row 5 5 half_double_crochet at the end of row 5 chain 2 and turn row 6 3 double_crochet in first st slip_stitch in next st 3 double_crochet next st slip_stitch in next st 3 double_crochet in last st fasten_off and weave in ends stitch legs to body as shown in photos of finished possum at top of pattern tail starting with dusty grey yarn and i hook chain 5 row 1 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each across chain 1 turn 4 half_double_crochet row 2 half_double_crochet across changing to baby pink yarn at last st chain 1 turn 4 half_double_crochet row 3 - 35 half_double_crochet each st across chain 1 turn 4 half_double_crochet row 36 button hole row half_double_crochet in first st chain 2 skip next 2 sts half_double_crochet in last st chain 1 turn 2 half_double_crochet 2 chain row 37 half_double_crochet in first st 2 half_double_crochet over chain from previous row half_double_crochet in last st chain 1 turn 4 half_double_crochet row 38 half_double_crochet each st across chain 1 turn 4 half_double_crochet row 39 repeat row 38 4 half_double_crochet row 40 hdc2tog over first two sts hdc2tog over last two sts chain 1 turn 2 half_double_crochet row 41 hdc2tog fasten_off weave in ends attach button then sew tail to body ears make 2 with dusty grey yarn and i hook row 1 magic_ring 6 half_double_crochet in ring pull tail of ring to close chain 1 turn 6 half_double_crochet row 2 2 half_double_crochet in each st across chain 1 turn 12 half_double_crochet ©2021 andrea lea/southern hooked stitches row 3 *1 half_double_crochet in first st 2 half_double_crochet in next st
